message.body: I didn't get a helper. I think we can do it. 8am. We'll go first thing to get materials. I found my chain hoist and I bought a compressor today
Alright. See you at eight am. Got a Milwaukee impact driver yesterday.
Have you taken 4' x 8' material up the stairs at your place? If it won't get up the stairs we should bring the drywall and ply up through the floor before closing the floor

The plan for me is we'd thru fri this week, Wednesday thru sunday next week then hopefully be at least to the point of being ready tile and put up drywall with the shower in place. Can maybe start tiling by next week
Let's try to get that ply upstairs first thing and if it won't then go ahead and pick up drywall for the bath tomorrow and get it upstairs before screwing the floor down
Hey I sent you an email with totals. If you can't do all of it tomorrow it's no problem but I got a few bills to take care of so do what you can
Got the totals. If it isn't all there by tomorrow, I can get it by Friday. Thanks.
Ok I'm printing out your materials so you have it
